title: Mysterious repeating fast radio burst traced to nearby galaxy
description: Astronomers have traced the signal of an enigmatic repeating fast radio burst for only the second time -- and it's in a spiral galaxy similar to our own, not so far away.

title: Lady Gaga tells Oprah: I was repeatedly raped at 19
description: During an interview with Oprah Winfrey, singer and actress Lady Gaga opened up about her mental health struggles.

title: CNN speaks to swing voters in Arizona
description: Voters in Arizona discuss with CNN's Miguel Marquez how they've been keeping up with President Trump's impeachment and whether it will affect their vote in 2020.

title: Over 60 killed in Jakarta flooding
description: Some of the most powerful monsoon rains seen in years have hit Indonesia's capital city, killing dozens of people and leaving thousands in shelters.

title: Student gets life sentence for 12-year rape campaign
description: Britain's most prolific rapist has been sentenced to life in prison, after being found guilty of drugging and sexually assaulting 48 different men at his apartment in Manchester over the course of more than a decade.

title: Aliens definitely exist and could be living among us on Earth, astronaut claims
description: Aliens definitely exist, Britain's first astronaut has said -- and it's possible they're living among us on Earth but have gone undetected so far.

title: New way of detecting oxygen on exoplanets could help find life
description: The search for oxygen on other planets outside of our solar system, called exoplanets, is thought to be an aid in the search for life outside of Earth. Now, astronomers have developed a new method for detecting oxygen on exoplanets, according to a new study published Monday.

title: Saudi Aramco has lost $200B in value since its post-IPO peak
description: Saudi Aramco shares have slumped to their lowest level since the state oil giant's record-breaking stock market debut, as investors brace for potential Iranian retaliation over last week's killing of the country's most powerful general in a US airstrike.

title: Sorry to break the news to you, but Baby Yoda isn't actually a baby Yoda
description: Baby Yoda was a latecomer to 2019 but dominated pop culture for the whole year with just a flick of his protruding green ears.

title: Golden Globes 2020: Best fashion on the red carpet
description: The first major red carpet of 2020 unfolded in style at the Beverly Hilton Sunday evening, as the stars arrived at the 77th Golden Globe Awards to celebrate the best of last year's TV and film.

title: The future of Samsung TVs? One that rotates to play vertical videos
description: From rollable TVs to those that double as artwork on walls, TV manufacturers have reached far into their bags of tricks over the years to impress consumers.

title: Artist John Baldessari has died aged 88
description: One of America's most influential contemporary artists John Baldessari has died aged 88.

title: Iran's military threat: US can't protect everything
description: Iran's vow to strike the US military in retaliation for the killing of its top general presents the Pentagon with a massive force protection problem that events of the past 48 hours -- and past 40 years -- illustrate in American blood.

title: Uproar and consequences mount for Trump
description: The Trump administration is already in danger of losing control of the swift chain reaction and political storm unleashed by its killing of Iran's top general, Qasem Suleimani.

title: Smoke in Australia's capital is so bad that the agency responsible for emergency management has shut
description: The Australian federal government department responsible for managing emergencies shut its Canberra office due to poor air quality on Monday as the nation's capital choked on smoke from deadly bushfires.

title: Speaking in front of a large crowd at her father's funeral procession in Tehran, Soleimani's daughter warned his death "will cause more awakening in the resistance front"
A diver is believed to have died after a great white shark attack in Western Australia
description: No trace of an Australian diver has been found more than 24 hours after what police believe was a fatal great white shark attack on Sunday.

title: Trump's threatened attack on cultural sites could be a war crime
Awkwafina makes Golden Globes history
description: Awkwafina has made Golden Globes history.

title: 66 people now killed by flooding in Jakarta, and more rain appears to be on the way
description: The death toll from flooding in the Indonesian capital of Jakarta has risen to 66, authorities say, with two people still missing after the megalopolis was hit by some of the most powerful monsoon rains seen in years.

title: Stars get political at the 2020 Golden Globes
description: Michelle Williams used her win to highlight women's rights. Patricia Arquette declared the US 'on the brink of war'. And Russell Crowe urged the world "to act" in the fight against climate change.

title: See rare thunderstorm clouds formed by Australia's fires
description: CNN's Derek Van Dam explains how pyrocumulonimbus clouds -- fire-induced thunderstorms -- are formed by Australia's massive bushfires and why they have in turn worsened the situation.

title: Trump threatens the stability of the world
description: Donald Trump resorted to extreme measures by ordering the killing of Iran's most revered military leader — something other presidents have had the opportunity to do and didn't. Iran has promised retaliation. When it comes, it's likely that Iraqis, Iranians and Americans will be killed. Whatever happens, I suspect that the President will take comfort in the fact that he was true to himself.

title: A wheel fell off an Air Canada plane during takeoff
description: An Air Canada Express flight lost a wheel shortly after takeoff from Montreal-Trudeau International Airport, forcing the plane to turn back.

title: The killing of Iran's top general won't stop a war. The US and Iran have already been fighting for more than 40 years
description: US President Donald Trump says he ordered the assassination on Friday of Iran's top general, Qasem Soleimani, "to stop a war." But that's simply not true.

title: Experts say the keto diet isn't sustainable, so why is it so popular?
description: America is in the midst of a keto craze. The trendy diet -- which bans carbs to make your body burn fat for fuel -- has kicked Weight Watchers' derrière on the stock market, captured the endorsement of celebrities such as Kourtney Kardashian and Halle Berry, and deluged the internet with recipes and copious social media chatter about pounds lost.

title: Boeing has uncovered another potential design flaw with the 737 Max
description: Hundreds of 737 Max jets are sitting, grounded, as Boeing awaits approval from aviation regulators for the troubled plane to return to flight. But now, the company has discovered yet another potential hurdle.

title: 'Power' is back with its final episodes of Season 6
description: After leaving fans on the edge -- literally -- "Power" is finally back with the rest of its sixth and final season.
